short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each tab opens a window to a different grayscale world, with your favorite sites always in focus at the bottom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a world of contrasts every time you open a new tab. Randomly selected monochrome masterpieces provide the backdrop for your digital departures.
